an6.35:1: "Bhikkhus, these six things pertain to true knowledge. What six? The perception of impermanence, the perception of suffering in the impermanent, the perception of non-self in what is suffering, the perception of abandoning, the perception of dispassion, and the perception of cessation.[n.306] These last three perceptions are explained atAN0.60.These six things pertain to true knowledge."
